entry.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin Knots 0.21.0.knots20210130 released
entry.summary: Bitcoin Knots has made available for download its latest version 0.21.0.knots20210130 which comes with new features, bug fixes and performance improvements, along with updated translations. Users are recommended to report any bugs using the issue tracker on GitHub and subscribe to the announcements mailing list to receive security and update notifications. Detailed information regarding this release can be found in the release notes and change log that are available on GitHub.
